| Property      | Attribute     | Description      | Type      | Default     |
| ------------- | ------------- | ---------------- | --------- | ----------- |

| `error`       | `error`       | Show error state | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `placeholder` | `placeholder` | Placeholder text | `string`  | `undefined` |
